TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Utils extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains utilities that the Visual Basic compiler uses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class supports the Visual Basic compiler and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

Docs.summary: Used by the Visual Basic compiler as a helper for .

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetResourceString (string ResourceKey, string[] Args);
.method public static string GetResourceString(string ResourceKey, string[] Args) cil managed

Docs.param: The identifier of the string or error message to retrieve.
An array of parameters to replace placeholders in the string or error message.
Docs.summary: Retrieves and formats a localized resource string or error message.
Docs.returns: A formatted resource string or error message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static string MethodToString(class System.Reflection.MethodBase Method) cil managed

Docs.param: A <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase> object to return a Visual Basic method signature for.
Docs.summary: Returns a Visual Basic method signature.
Docs.returns: The Visual Basic method signature for the supplied <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase> object.

Docs.param: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object to set as the culture of the current thread.
Docs.summary: Sets the culture of the current thread.
Docs.returns: The previous value of the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> property for the current thread.
